name: filter[search]
description:
String of characters you want to look for in a shipment's attributes. Available fields to look in are:
  • `date_created` (YYYY-MM-DD). Deprecated use `filter[created_at][date_from]` and `filter[created_at][date_to]` instead.
  • `description`
  • `customer_reference`
  • `recipient_address`
  • `tracking_code`
